Text: imdb says language is french and italian with little bit of english so we need english subs or no point getting this
Plays OK (in English language) in VLC 1.1.10 for me. Great quality. Excellent stories. Terence Stamp is great.
I think since the title is 'Spirits of the Dead' instead of 'Histoires Extraordinaures' that is the hard coded English version. Don't trust IMdb for everything!
